meanings.sent1: She carefully uncrumpled the paper to read the hidden message.
meanings.sent2: I always uncrumple my clothes before hanging them in the closet.
meanings.sent3: After a long day, he uncrumpled his tired body on the cozy couch.
meanings.sent4: Her smile uncrumpled the tension in the room like magic.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze uncrumpled the petals of the delicate flower.

meanings.definition: Make (something that is crumpled) flat again
meanings.sent1: Using an iron, she uncrumpled the wrinkled shirt for the party.
meanings.sent2: He carefully uncrumpled the old map to reveal the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to uncrumple the blanket before taking a nap.
meanings.sent4: His apology helped uncrumple the misunderstanding between them.
meanings.sent5: The warm sun rays uncrumpled the fallen leaves on the path.
